ISSUE.TITLE: TaxonomyField with Tags display, error 400
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug Taxonomy field with Tags display placed in ContentPart inside Widget throws error while saving content item. ### To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Create content part with taxonomy field and tags display 2. Create widget, add content part from step 1 3. Add widget to flow of some content item 4. Try save = throws error 400 ### Expected behavior Content item should be saved. Also, it works when Standard display is used.
